reporter_caption.center: WAL-MART DISTR. CTR. v. PEREZ, 1D03-2125 (Fla.App. 1 Dist. 6-7-2004)

caption.center: WAL-MART DISTRIBUTION CENTER #6071 and INTEGRATED ADMINISTRATORS,
Appellants, v. REIMUNDO PEREZ, JR., Appellee.

court.center: District Court of Appeal of Florida, First District.

opinion.posture: An appeal from an order from the Judge of Compensation Claims, Mark H. Hofstad, Judge.
opinion.attorneys:
Tiffany Stanton Trussel of Ross, Vecchio Trussel, P.A., Lakeland, Attorney for Appellants.
David Dismuke, Lakeland; and Bill McCabe of Shepherd, McCabe Cooley, Longwood, Attorneys for Appellee.
opinion.opinion_text:
AFFIRMED.
BOOTH, WEBSTER and DAVIS, JJ., CONCUR.
NOT FINAL UNTIL TIME EXPIRES TO FILE MOTION FOR REHEARING AND DISPOSITION THEREOF, IF FILED.
